name: NidoHazard
description:
Summary
  • The year is 2055, technology has advanced to the point where what were once considered miracles are now everyday occurrences.
  • Play as N.I.D.O (Nano Intelligence Doctor), a nanobot whose sole purpose is to protect the human body from ailments and disease.
  • Traverse the human body and protect it from day-to-day dangers. But beware, the human will not make things that easy…
Controls
  • Movement: Left Joystick
  • Pick-up object: X
  • Jump: A
  • Interact: B

* NidoHazard's experience is best enjoyed with 2 players

NidoHazard was created by SHVFS GD02 students in a span of 5 months
